name.title: WyzeSuite
name.description: This name will appear in your Homebridge log

username.title: Username (E-Mail Address)
username.description: The e-mail address used for your Wyze account

password.title: Password
password.description: The password used for your Wyze account

path2py_stubs.title: Path to Python helper scripts
path2py_stubs.description: The location where the Python helper scripts are installed

debugLevel.title: Debug Level
debugLevel.description: Specify the Debug Level. 0 ==> no debug output, 1 ==> debug output to Homebridge logfile, 2 ==> system level logging

deviceDiscoveryTimeout.title: Discovery Timeout
deviceDiscoveryTimeout.description: Specify the amount of milliseconds to wait between each device discovery attempt e.g 1000 for 1 second.

maximumDiscoveryAttempts.title: Maximum Discovery Attempts
maximumDiscoveryAttempts.description: Specify the maximum allowed attempts to discovery Wyze devices before stopping. If tries run out, you will have to restart the plugin.

refreshIntervalMilliSeconds.title: RefreshTimeMilliseconds
refreshIntervalMilliSeconds.description: Specify amount of time in milliseconds between refreshing Wyze Thermostate device data

newDataTimeout.title: NewDataTimeout
newDataTimeout.description: Specify amount of time in milliseconds allowed before Wyze data is stale. Will refresh on call if exceeded.
